unnormalised: Rental Agreements: Are you signing on the dotted line too fast?
normalised: rental agreements: are you signing on the dotted line too fast?

unnormalised: Hey folks! Getting ready to move into your dream apartment in Bandra? Hold your horses! Before you hand over that hefty deposit (I’m talking serious moolah, like Rs. 50,000 or more!), make sure you actually *read* your rental agreement.
normalised: hey folks! getting ready to move into your dream apartment in Bandra? hold your horses! before you hand over that hefty deposit (i am talking serious moolah, like rupee fifty thousand or more!), make sure you actually read your rental agreement.

unnormalised: Seriously, we know it's boring. More exciting to binge-watch "Gully Boy" again, right? But trust us, it's more important.
normalised: seriously, we know it is boring. more exciting to binge-watch "gully boy" again, right? but trust us, it is more important.

unnormalised: Landlords in Mumbai, and even Bangalore, can sometimes slip in clauses that aren't exactly tenant-friendly. Think exorbitant late payment fees, restrictions on guests, and even unexpected maintenance charges.
normalised: landlords in Mumbai, and even Bangalore, can sometimes slip in clauses that aren't exactly tenant-friendly. think exorbitant late payment fees, restrictions on guests, and even unexpected maintenance charges.

unnormalised: This isn’t like your college hostel agreement, where you just agreed to avoid loud music after 10 pm (good luck with that!).
normalised: this isn't like your college hostel agreement, where you just agreed to avoid loud music after ten p m (good luck with that!).

unnormalised: Legal experts at the ILS Law College in Pune are urging renters to pay closer attention to the fine print.
normalised: legal experts at the I L S law college in Pune are urging renters to pay closer attention to the fine print.

unnormalised: Things like lock-in periods, escalation clauses (how much rent increases each year), and what happens if you want to move out early are super important. Don't be caught off guard! Save yourself some stress (and maybe some serious Rs.) down the line. Happy house hunting!
normalised: things like lock-in periods, escalation clauses (how much rent increases each year), and what happens if you want to move out early are super important. don't be caught off guard! save yourself some stress (and maybe some serious rupees) down the line. happy house hunting!
